TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DynamicRenderer extends System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn

summary.span: 当用户移动触笔时，会在图面上绘制墨迹。

span.span: Draws ink on a surface as the user moves the tablet pen.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类继承自类，并允许用户将触笔或其他指针设备使用鼠标指针移动到图面上呈现墨迹。The class inherits from the class, and allows ink to be rendered to a surface as the user moves the mouse pointer with a tablet pen or other pointing device. 可以使用若要动态呈现墨迹上自定义控件，或从其继承来执行自定义呈现实时上启用手写内容的元素，如。You can use the to dynamically render ink on a custom control, or inherit from to perform custom rendering in real time on an ink-enabled element, such as the . 当用户使用 tablet 笔输入墨迹时，独立于应用程序的用户界面线程的线程上执行动态呈现。Dynamic rendering is done on a thread separate from the application's user interface thread when the user inputs ink with a tablet pen. 使用鼠标时，会在 UI 线程上执行动态呈现。When a mouse is used, dynamic rendering is done on the UI thread. > [!NOTE] > 若要引用此类作为[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]元素中，必须将映射CLR 命名空间前缀，并使用该前缀来限定元素。In order to reference this class as a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] element, you must map the CLR namespace to a prefix, and use that prefix to qualify the element. 有关详细信息，请参阅[XAML 命名空间和 WPF XAML Namespace 映射](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md)。For details, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md). ## XAML 文本使用情况XAML Text Usage 在 XAML 中通常不使用此类。This class is not typically used in XAML. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将附加到。The following example demonstrates how to attach a to an . 若要创建的控件，动态呈现墨迹，请参阅[创建墨迹输入控件](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/creating-an-ink-input-control.md)。To create a control that dynamically renders ink, see [Creating an Ink Input Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/creating-an-ink-input-control.md). [!code-csharp[StylusPluginSamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusPluginSamples/CSharp/StylusControl.cs#3)] [!code-vb[StylusPluginSamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusPluginSamples/VisualBasic/StylusControl.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 文本使用情况XAML Text Usage 在 XAML 中通常不使用此属性。This property is not typically used in XAML. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建对象。The following example demonstrates how to create a object for a . 在此示例中，动态呈现的墨迹匹配指定的属性`inkDA`。In this example, the dynamically rendered ink matches the properties specified by `inkDA`. 若要创建的控件，动态呈现墨迹，请参阅[创建墨迹输入控件](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/creating-an-ink-input-control.md)。To create a control that dynamically renders ink, see [Creating an Ink Input Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/creating-an-ink-input-control.md). summary.span: 墨迹的绘制是实时的，因此墨迹看起来就像从触笔或其他指针设备中“流”出来一样。

span.span: Draws the ink in real-time so it appears to "flow" from the tablet pen or other pointing device.

summary.span: 当触笔接触数字化仪时，在笔线程池中的线程上发生。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法在笔线程上发生因此尽量少使用此方法，以免影响性能。This method occurs on a pen thread, so minimize work in this method to avoid impacting performance.

span.span: The current stylus device.

param.name: stylusPoints
param.span: 要重新绘制的触笔接触点。

span.span: The stylus points to be redrawn.

summary.span: 清除对当前笔画的呈现并重新绘制它。

span.span: Clears rendering on the current stroke and redraws it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重绘次数表示当前笔画和触笔接触点的任何传入方法。The redraws the current stroke and any of the stylus points passed into the method. 此方法，可重新绘制笔画，用户仍创建 stroke 时。This method allows you to redraw a stroke while the user is still creating the stroke. 必须触及数字化仪的触笔或鼠标左键必须按下时调用。The tablet pen must be touching the digitizer or the left mouse button must be pressed when is called. ## Examples 下面的示例更改所绘制的当前笔画的颜色。The following example changes the color of the current stroke as it is being drawn. [!code-csharp[StylusPluginSamples#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusPluginSamples/CSharp/StylusControl.cs#13)] [!code-vb[StylusPluginSamples#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/StylusPluginSamples/VisualBasic/StylusControl.vb#13)]

exception.span: 触笔或鼠标均未处于关闭状态。

span.span: Neither the stylus nor the mouse is in the down state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你使用，必须将附加属性设置为使用方法。When you use a , you must attach the property to the by using the method. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建并添加到。The following example demonstrates how to create a and add the to the . 若要创建的控件，动态呈现墨迹，请参阅[创建墨迹输入控件](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/creating-an-ink-input-control.md)。To create a control that dynamically renders ink, see [Creating an Ink Input Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/creating-an-ink-input-control.md).
